name: Pearl Communications
tagline: Philadelphia PR and Social Media Firm
description:
Pearl Communications is a greater Philadelphia public relations and social media firm which caters to lifestyles brands with a primary focus on culinary clientele.
Pearl is a business that starts and ends with relationships, nailing your brand’s definition of success is our highest priority. The stronger our relationships are with you, the clients, the more fluent we become in sharing your business’ news and accomplishments with the outside world; and, the more authentic we sound.
